preference.name: SUBSCMPL_ssl_cert_full_file_path
preference.preference_description: Specifies the full path of the trust certificate file to be used for an SSL-based compliance check. Valid values: The full path of the trust certificate file stored on the Teamcenter Integration Framework host (including the name of the certificate file) Examples: 1. %TC_DATA%\subscmpl_data\config\vc6s004.cer 2. C:\apps\tc\tc12\TD\subscmpl_data\config\vc6s004.cer
